resumeBullets: Collaborated with a cross-functional team to design and engineer puzzles that furthered the story's central themes on self-labels, image, and reconciliation using an alternative controller.
Innovated tactile puzzle mechanics that received external sensor input detecting physical interactions including touch, dial turns, and item placement through the Arduino.
